s-1.ptxt: INSPECT FRONT SEAT OUTER BELT ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Before installing the outer belt, check the ELR.

s3.ptxt: When the inclination of the retractor is 15° or less, check that the belt can be pulled from the retractor. When the inclination of the retractor is over 45°, check that the belt locks.
If the result is not as specified, replace the outer belt assembly.
